Class User

    • emailer.User
  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    Emiley

    The User class INTERACTS with the user And return the ample output according to the input It is a MaILING system that allows user to Compose Mail, Access Inbox, Access All Sent Mails, Create and Save Drafts
